name: Hexes
description:
Hexes, a new puzzle game from Elektri.

Move gems across the game board to get matches of 3. But, watch out, moving a single gem will move all gems, and adds more gems to the board.

Plan your moves carefully. Once the board is full of gems its game over. Matching 3 or more gems will remove them from the board and keep your game going.

With lots of challenge and replay-ability, how high will your score in Hexes be?
